title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content: been infected with a parasite. He was hostile at first, but agreed to join us when he learned we were infected too. Astarion is a vampire! We woke up last night and saw him bent over one of us - drinking their blood. We let him drink his fill to regain his strength. We learned that Astarion was murdered by a Gur nomad long ago. The vampire lord Cazador came to his aid and made him a vampire spawn. We told Astarion that he couldn't feed on innocents - but enemies were fair game. We told Astarion
